data.news_info_part_0: In Update 1.4.9 Steering Assist has been changed (physics has not undergone any changes). In the Control Settings -> Additional window, the ability to switch between the old and new versions of the Steering Assist has been added.
data.news_info_part_1:
Your car settings may not be relevant, as the old assistant did not work properly. In the new version of the assistant the car is more stable in transitions and gives you more control over the car at small angles. If the car is very sharp on transition, make the rear suspension more softer, or vice versa rigid if there is no enough sharpness.

CarX Technologies.

-Skill rating on a scale from 0 - 3000+

-2 participants in the race
-Who has more drift points and he won

-The season begins with the qualifying races
-The season lasts 30 days

data.car_profile_window_save_changes_text: Do you want to save your changes?
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_spring: Springs designed to absorb vibrations. The height of the spring determines the car's center of gravity and its handling on quick turns.
Affects the car's handling on sharp turns and off-road driving.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_suspen: Affects tilt and stability during turns, as well as the car's general handling.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_toe: The angle between the direction of movement and the plane of rotation of the tyres. Affects the ease of keeping the car straight.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_camber: The angle between the vertical vector and the plane of rotation of the tyres. Affects steering during turns and while drifting.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_caster: Affects tread contact with the road surface and turn stability.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_ackerm: Difference between the angles of the left and right wheel. Affects handling during turns and while drifting.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_lock: Steering setting for improved drifting. Helps drivers reach a larger drift angle.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_stabil: A weight that prevents the car from flipping during turns and facilitates smooth turns.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_spring_: Springs designed to absorb vibrations. The height of the spring determines the car's center of gravity and its handling on quick turns.
Affects the car's handling on sharp turns and off-road driving.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_suspens: Affects tilt and stability during turns, as well as the car's general handling.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_toe: The angle between the direction of movement and the plane of rotation of the tyres. Affects the ease of keeping the car straight.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_camber: The angle between the vertical vector and the plane of rotation of the tyres. Affects steering during turns and while drifting.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_stabili: A weight that prevents the car from flipping during turns and facilitates smooth turns.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_disc_d: Affects acceleration, speed, and overall handling.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_tyre_w: Affects acceleration, braking, traction, maneuverability when turning, off-road performance, and car weight.
data.car_profile_prm_description_front_tyre_p: Affects handling, off-road performance, and smoothness of the ride.
Affects handling, and the car's behavior.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_disc_di: Affects acceleration, speed, and overall handling.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_tyre_wi: Affects acceleration, braking, traction, maneuverability when turning, off-road performance, and car weight.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rear_tyre_pr: Affects handling, off-road performance, and smoothness of the ride.
Affects handling, and the car's behavior.
data.car_profile_prm_description_max_torque: Engine tune-up affects the car's baseline performance, as well as maximum speed and acceleration.
data.car_profile_prm_description_max_torque_r: The range of maximum rotational momentum when engine power is at its highest. Affects the vehicle's top speed.
data.car_profile_prm_description_rev_limiter: The number of revs after which the limiter is activated. Affects the vehicle's top speed.
data.car_profile_prm_description_turbo_charge: A turbine increases the air flow, thereby increasing the power of the car.
data.car_profile_prm_description_turbo_pressu: Affects the overall power of the engine.
data.car_profile_prm_description_diff_lock_co: Affects vehicle off-road performance, handling and stability when driving.
data.car_profile_prm_description_final_drive: The gear ratio determines the magnitude of the acceleration and top speed.
data.car_profile_prm_description_max_brake_to: Affects the strength and speed of the car braking, especially on turns and while drifting.
data.car_profile_prm_description_brake_front_: The distribution of braking force between the axles. It affects the behavior of the car when braking on curves.
data.catalog_gotohit_text:
There is a discount on this automobile.
Read the conditions of the deal?
data.car_profile_rent_window_text: Use a tune-up service for {0} hours for
data.car_profile_rent_window_free: For the next {0} hours, your tune-up service will fully service your automobile for free.
data.tutorial1_exit_text: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial?
data.tutorial1_pack1_w1_text: My name's Christie. Let me guess: You're new here. But I can tell you've got potential. How about I show you how things work around here?
data.tutorial1_pack2_w1_text: The first thing you'll need is your own car. I know just the one for you.
data.tutorial1_pack2_w2_text: I recommend the Panter M5. It's perfect for when you're starting out.
data.tutorial1_pack2_w3_title: But we still have things to do.
data.tutorial1_pack2_w3_text: There will be time to look around later. Let's take care of the most important things first.
data.tutorial1_pack2_w4_text: Looks like you can't afford that right now. You'll be able to buy it later.
data.tutorial1_pack3_w2_text: Let's go try it out on the track. You'll see why I like it for you.
data.tutorial1_pack3_w3_text: Let's start with a run in Drift mode. It's easy: do turns while drifting and earn drift points.
data.tutorial1_pack3_w4_text: A simple, wide track. Just what the doctor ordered.
data.tutorial1_pack4_w1_text:
Your race reward depends on how many drift points you earn.
[f0b650][tap to continue]
data.tutorial1_pack4_w2_text:
Earn enough points and you'll get an extra track cup reward.
[f0b650][tap to continue]
data.tutorial1_pack4_w3_text:
The more prestigious the cup, the bigger the reward for it.
[f0b650][tap to continue]
data.tutorial1_pack5_w1_text: Vehicles can be upgraded in the setup section.
data.tutorial1_pack5_w3_text: The Turbo setup increases vehicles' power.
data.tutorial1_pack6_w1_text: It's always good to get as much as you can out of a rig, but eventually you'll want more. Let me show you where to get it.
data.tutorial1_pack6_w2_text: In the shop you can see a full list of all the available cars.
data.tutorial1_pack6_w3_text:
Each one is a member of a certain class. A vehicle's class affects the rewards you will receive for racing.
[f0b650][tap to continue]
data.tutorial1_pack7_w1_text: And the finishing touch: If you want your car to have a unique style, you can repaint it. First time's on me!
data.tutorial1_pack7_w2_text: You can change how your car looks in the CUSTOMIZE section.
data.tutorial1_pack8_w1_text: It's time to install the Drift setting. If you want to be a serious competitor, it's a must.
data.tutorial1_pack8_w2_text: The Drift setup is the best for controlled drift.
data.tutorial1_pack9_w1_text: SETUP allows you to fully change your car's action. Try to find the best options!
data.tutorial1_pack10_w1_text: Way to go! You're really getting the hang of it. It's time to try out some multiplayer battles. Show them what you've got!
data.tutorial1_pack10_w2_text: In multiplayer games you can compete with other players and show off your drifting skills.
data.tutorial1_pack11_w1_text: Speed and time are important in this mode. Use the Racing setup to achieve the best results.
data.tutorial1_pack12_w1_text: Not bad! If you don't want to lose your progress, you'd better save. Set up synchronization.
data.tutorial1_pack12_w2_text: Begin syncing, and your progress will be saved automatically from now on.
data.tutorial2_1_text:
Changing the linearity of the rudder can increase its sensitivity in the central zone,
and lower it in the maximum
data.tutorial2_2_text:
Use the hand brake 
to start drifting quickly.
data.tutorial2_3_text:
Hit the gas to control the angle of the drift and 
avoid getting turned around.
data.tutorial2_4_text:
Wait until your combo bar is full,
then change drift direction to increase your combo multiplier.
data.tutorial2_5_text:
The Racing setup isn't good for drifting,
but it's perfect for Time Attack mode.
data.tutorial2_6_text:
To change the direction of your drift
slow down before you start your maneuver.
data.tutorial2_7_text:
The Drift, Racing, and Ultimate setup
allow you to adjust your vehicle's specs.
data.tutorial2_8_text:
You can adjust the position of the rear-view mirror 
in the "Game" settings menu.
data.tutorial2_9_text:
Before the competition with other players,
train in a single player game.
data.tutorial2_10_text:
Every vehicle has a class. The higher it is,
the better the reward after a race.
data.tutorial2_11_text:
Every car is unique,
and requires its own driving style.
data.tutorial2_12_text:
The Ultimate setup increases the car's power and allows
full regulation of all specs.
data.tutorial2_13_text:
Run a track backwards
to get to know it all over again.
data.tutorial2_14_text: Participate in a multiplayer game, call your friends, play together!
data.tutorial2_15_text: Create competitions to test your skills against other players.
data.tutorial2_16_text:
Compete with friends in two modes: 
"Drift" and "Time Attak"
data.tutorial2_17_text:
By changing this parameter, you can increase the sensitivity of the pedal in the central zone 
and lower the maximum
data.tutorial2_18_text:
Use photo mode to save
the best moments of your races.
data.tutorial2_19_text: You can switch cameras to see the race from the driver's seat.
data.tutorial2_20_text: The better your result in the race the more reward.
data.mp_leaguelist_help: Work on your ratings to get to the top! If you hold top position till the end of the season, you'll be promoted to the higher league and receive a nice reward.
data.tutorial1_pack4_w4_text: You don't have sufficient power, but I know how to fix that.
data.tutorial1_pack5_w4_text: The Racing setup is the best for Time Attack mode
data.tutorial1_pack5_w5_text: With the Drift setup you'll get a perfect drift car
data.tutorial1_pack5_w6_text: The Ultimate setup maximizes a car's power and allows you to adjust all of its settings.
data.tutorial1_pack5_w7_text: Add TURBO and entering controlled drifts will be much easier.
data.tutorial1_pack5_w8_text: This setup is well worth the cost.
data.tutorial1_pack6_w4_text:
The higher the class, the better the reward. A 2nd-class car will get twice as much as a 1st-class car, etc.
[f0b650][tap to continue]
data.tutorial1_pack7_w3_text: Everything is set for a real race. What are you waiting for? It's time to burn rubber!
data.push_message_free_cash_ready: Get cash for free! All videos are available again.
data.push_message_season_end_warning: You have just 12 hours to participate in the competition!
data.push_message_shop_action_end_warning: This offer will last for only 12 hours!
data.settings_controls_st_assist_text: Disabling the assistance will dramatically increase the driving difficulty and may result in a totally different perception of the gaming experience. Do you want to disable the assistance?
data.push_message_enter_and_reward1: Claim your reward! Its waiting for you in the game.
data.push_message_enter_and_reward2: Theres a special prize for you! Enter the game to get it!

data.settings_input_accLinearity_hint: By changing this parameter, you can increase the sensitivity of the gas pedal in the central area and reduce it toward the edge
data.settings_input_brakeLinearity_hint: By changing this parameter, you can increase the sensitivity of the brake pedal in the central area and reduce it toward the edge

data.settings_input_handbrakeLinearity_hint: By changing this parameter, you can increase the sensitivity of the handbrake in the central area and reduce it toward the edge
data.tutorial_tips1_drift1:
[E3B457FF]Welcome to Drift Mode![-]
Your task is to earn as many drift points as you can in 1 lap.
data.tutorial_tips1_drift2:
The better your score,
the more experience and money you get at the finish line!
data.tutorial_tips1_timeattack1:
[E3B457FF]Welcome to Timed Mode![-]
Your task is to complete 1 lap in the minimum possible time.
data.tutorial_tips1_timeattack2:
Remember! Speed is important here.
The faster you are, the more experience and money you get at the finish line!
data.tutorial_tips1_multiplayer1:
[E3B457FF]Welcome to multiplayer![-]
There are no rules here, just your friends and the track.
data.tutorial_tips1_multiplayer2:
Remember! Speed is important here.
The faster you are, the more experience and money you get at the finish line!

data.tutorial_tips1_multiplayer3:
[E3B457FF]New Duel mode[-]
In this mode, two players must pass through a special section of clipping zones/points.
